workflow_name: Complete Platform Setup - Software Engineering Graduate Program 2025
description: AI-assisted workflow to create complete organization structure with all entities

execution_order.description: Create multi-location training programs with sub-projects
Create learning tracks for each sub-project
execution_order.mapping_strategy: Map each track to corresponding sub-project by name

execution_order.description: Create courses and assign to tracks
execution_order.mapping_strategy: Map courses to tracks based on track field in template

execution_order.description: Create instructor accounts and assign to tracks with scheduling
execution_order.mapping_strategy: Create users with instructor role, assign to locations and tracks based on schedule

execution_order.description: Create student accounts and enroll in tracks by city
execution_order.mapping_strategy: Create users with student role, assign to city location, enroll in all specified tracks

execution_order.description: Verify all entities are created correctly and relationships are established
verification_checks: All 4 tracks have assigned instructors and students
Instructor track assignments respect date ranges
Students are enrolled in correct city location

ai_assistant_instructions.role: You are an AI assistant helping to set up a complete Software Engineering Graduate Program
ai_assistant_instructions.context: You will receive templates defining an organization structure with multi-location training programs, learning tracks, courses, instructors, and students. Your task is to create all entities in the correct order and establish relationships between them.
guidelines: Process templates in the specified execution order
Wait for each step to complete before starting the next
Map entities using the specified mapping strategies
Verify success criteria after each step
Handle errors gracefully and report any issues
Maintain referential integrity (don't create child entities before parents)
Respect date ranges for instructor track assignments
Assign students to locations based on their city field
Enroll students in all tracks specified in enrolled_tracks array

error_handling.on_failure: Stop workflow, report error details, do not proceed to next step
error_handling.rollback_strategy: Manual cleanup - log all created entity IDs for potential rollback
error_handling.retry_policy: Retry failed API calls up to 3 times with exponential backoff

expected_outcomes.completion_message: Software Engineering Graduate Program 2025 successfully created across 5 cities with 15 students and 10 instructors
